room_title: Escape room "Red Riding Hood" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Fun, great room!  Nice atmosphere. Puzzles were fun.  Immersive.  Go for it!

room_title: Escape room "Red Riding Hood" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: We did Red Riding Hood room. It was awesome. Staff very nice. Reasonably priced. Good for all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Red Riding Hood" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: I'll start off by saying I'm not the most experienced when it comes to escape rooms. So much so that I didn't even realize the entrance itself was a puzzle. But thankfully the great staff realized my lack of skill and saved the day!I joined some friends for Robin Hood and was thoroughly impressed. I felt like every puzzle was difficult but had some sort of clues to help out, and each one left you satisfied. They take a different approach to clues than Ive experienced by giving written riddles when asked, adding to the fun.Definitely worth checking out, and I plan on going back again for more!

room_title: Escape room "Red Riding Hood" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: From the arrival til when we left it was awesome. The staff was wonderful and explained everything. We did the Red Riding Hood Room. We enjoyed it so much we wanted to do another room when we got out! Very clean venue and table games available to play while you wait to enter your room. Can't wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Red Riding Hood" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Time of our lives. Can't wait to go back. The Red Riding Hood room was amazing and Alexis is the best. We finished with 18 minutes left. Absolutely the best adventure ever.
